models
Class Jena

java.lang.Object
  models.Jena

public class Jena
extends java.lang.Object

This class is used to manage the RDF Triple store. It saves to and queries the store for users and venues

Author:
BSGTeam

Saves a user to the user rdf triple store

Parameters:
fullame - user's name
id - user's twitter id
location - user's location
image - user's profile image
description - description
locationVisited - locations user has visited
peopleContacted - people user has contacted

Saves a venue to the venue rdf triple store

Parameters:
visitorName - - visitors to this venue
venueName - - name of venue
photos - - photos int eh venue
categories - - venue category
address - - address of venue
description - - description of venue
url - - venue url
checkinTime - - time visitor checked in

Returns:

Parameters:
visitor - user visiting venue
venue - venue name
time - time of checkin
